President Xi focused on 3 elements of mutual respect, coexistence and…

legacy.name: Serena Xue Dong

result.text:
Essence of Xi-Biden🇨🇳 🇺🇸 summit opening remarks.

President Xi focused on 3 elements of mutual respect, coexistence and win-win cooperation.
President Biden focused on the need for exchanges, managing competition and areas of cooperation.

Xi to Biden:
▪Turning back on each other is not an option
▪ Unrealistic to remodel the other side
▪ ️Earth big enough for both countries to develop
▪ ️mutual respect, peaceful coexistence & win-win coop. -key for #China #US to get along

Biden to Xi:
▪To ensure that competition does not veer into conflict
▪To manage our competition responsively
▪Demand joint efforts combating global challenges from climate change to AI

legacy.name: Jason Smith - 上官杰文

result.text:
In a Win-Win Diplomatic Statement: China and the US issued a joint communication committing to a global target of tripling global renewable energy by 2030.

"Both countries “are aware of the important role they play” and “will work together ... to rise up to one of the greatest challenges of our time,” they said in a statement released Wednesday in Beijing and Tuesday evening in Washington."

China has as much installed renewable energy as the rest of the world combined, and a joint effort would support more global development.

#Climatestrike #RenewableEnergy #China
https://t.co/Yq3wLexgpD
